EmailTemplate.name: ERSK Malfunction of web page / Bug on web page EN
EmailTemplate.subject: ERSK Malfunction of web page / Bug on web page EN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Within the control of our web page www.mojedenred.sk we spotted a bug.
We are so sorry about this and we work hard at this moment to make it work again.
Thank you for understanding.
Best regards,
Operator ID: {!Case.OwnerId} Case ID: {!Case.Id}
